title: 691: BITCOIN WILL HIT $160K THIS YEAR ON ONE CONDITION, SAYS CELSIUS NETWORK CEO!!!!
description:
The co-founder and CEO of blockchain platform Celsius Network says that Bitcoin could hit a new record high this year if one condition is fulfilled.

“I am still holding my projections that we will be hitting the $140,000 to $160,000 levels. It might take us into Q1 of next year but it’s definitely going higher.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
